languages.text: {n}Извращенная чуждость внутренностей мутанта вызывает вопрос — может ли он вообще считаться человеком? Ваша рука нащупывает в пищеводе какой-то предмет. Кто-то затолкал черное перо в глотку убитого.{/n}

{n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Извращенная чуждость внутренностей мутанта вызывает вопрос — может ли он вообще считаться человеком? Ваша рука нащупывает в пищеводе какой-то предмет. Кто-то затолкал черное перо в глотку убитого.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The twisted abnormality of the mutant's insides makes you wonder if he can be considered human at all. Your hand finds something in the victim's gullet. Someone had stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

{n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au vu des anomalies monstrueuses que présentent les organes internes du mutant, vous vous demandez si on peut encore le considérer comme un être humain. Alors que vous continuez à inspecter son cadavre, vous découvrez un objet logé dans sa trachée : on lui a enfoncé une plume noire dans la gorge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au vu des anomalies monstrueuses que présentent les organes internes du mutant, vous vous demandez si on peut encore le considérer comme un être humain. Alors que vous continuez à inspecter son cadavre, vous découvrez un objet logé dans sa trachée : on lui a enfoncé une plume noire dans la gorge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las retorcidas anomalías del interior del mutante hace que te preguntes si se le sigue pudiendo considerar humano. Conforme profundizas, tu mano encuentra algo atascado en la garganta de la víctima: alguien le ha metido una pluma negra en el cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las retorcidas anomalías del interior del mutante hace que te preguntes si se le sigue pudiendo considerar humano. Conforme profundizas, tu mano encuentra algo atascado en la garganta de la víctima: alguien le ha metido una pluma negra en el cuello.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个变种人畸形的内脏扭曲得不成样子，让你不禁怀疑这个人到底还能不能算是人。当你探得更深时，你注意到受害者的食道里卡着什么东西——有人把一根黑色的羽毛塞进了他的喉咙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个变种人畸形的内脏扭曲得不成样子，让你不禁怀疑这个人到底还能不能算是人。当你探得更深时，你注意到受害者的食道里卡着什么东西——有人把一根黑色的羽毛塞进了他的喉咙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ミュータントの体内のねじれた異常を見ていると、果たしてこの男は本当に人間なのだろうかとさえ迷ってくる。さらに奥を探ると、あなたの手は被害者の胃袋に何かが詰まっているのを見つけた。喉の中に、黒い羽根を詰めたものがいるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ミュータントの体内のねじれた異常を見ていると、果たしてこの男は本当に人間なのだろうかとさえ迷ってくる。さらに奥を探ると、あなたの手は被害者の胃袋に何かが詰まっているのを見つけた。喉の中に、黒い羽根を詰めたものがいるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das grauenhaft entstellte Innere des Mutanten wirft die Frage auf, ob er überhaupt als menschlich angesehen werden kann. Als du tiefer wühlst, finden deine Hände in der Speiseröhre des Opfers etwas: Jemand hat dem Mann eine schwarze Feder in den Rachen gestopft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das grauenhaft entstellte Innere des Mutanten wirft die Frage auf, ob er überhaupt als menschlich angesehen werden kann. Als du tiefer wühlst, finden deine Hände in der Speiseröhre des Opfers etwas: Jemand hat dem Mann eine schwarze Feder in den Rachen gestopft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mutantın eğrilip bükülmüş, anormal iç organları; adamın insan olarak değerlendirilip değerlendirilemeyeceğini düşünmene yol açıyor. Daha da derinlere indiğinde elin, kurbanın gırtlağına takılıp kalmış bir şeye denk geliyor. Birisi, adamın boğazına kara bir tüy tıkamış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The twisted abnormalities of the mutant's insides make you wonder if he can even be considered human at all. As you probe deeper, your hand finds something lodged in the victim's gullet: someone has stuffed a black feather into the man's throat.{/n}
